com.emmes.aps.medication

Class MedicationDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emmes.aps.medication.MedicationDetails

  • public class MedicationDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class MedicationDetails is for handling the list item detail info and is used to generate custom view of the list item. AdapterMedicationList.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup).
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mahbubur Rahman
